theVariantHasBeenChanged: The variant has been changed. The change will be visible after relogging.
youAreCurrentlyUsingTheTrialPeriod:
You are currently using the trial period of the service, do you want to end the trial period and go into production mode?

The operation involves setting a new service expiration date and purchasing a subscription (the operation is irreversible).

After completing the process, you will be redirected to the payment page and you will also receive a pro forma invoice by email. After making the payment, you must log in to the service again to download the new subscription status.

Do you want to continue?

userGuide.runGuideAgain: You can start the tutorial hints by clicking on the icon

1.title: Users
1.text: The user list shows all accounts that are visible under your service accounts.

2.title: Users
2.text: Using the Add or Correct option you can add or change user data.

3.title: Users
3.text: The Add or Remove User from Group options allow you to assign a user to a permission group.

4.title: Users
4.text: Using the Block access to the application and Unlock access to the application options, you can temporarily block a user's access to the application, thus freeing up the ability for another user to enable it instead.

5.title: Users
5.text: The Import option is dedicated to users who have accounts in the application and want to import them to Wapro Anywhere Online, thus changing their logins to email addresses.

1.title: Start
1.text: The Home tab provides a summary of your account. Here you can quickly check which users, companies and applications you have.

2.title: Groups
2.text: The Groups tab allows you to create and manage permissions for user groups

3.title: Users
3.text: The Users tab allows you to view the list of users, add them and grant access to the application. You can also import existing accounts from the app.

4.title: Companies
4.text: The Companies tab allows you to view the companies available under your account.

5.title: Quick actions
5.text: Using quick actions, you can add or import a user and assign him to a group.

6.title: Statistics
6.text: The statistics section in numbers shows how many companies, users and user groups there are in your account.

7.title: Companies Section
7.text: The Companies section is a quick preview of what companies you have created.

8.title: Available applications
8.text: In the Available applications section you will find information about the applications you have purchased as part of the service and how many users you have created in them.

9.title: Users section
9.text: The Users section allows you to immediately see the list of logins you have created within your account and see what group they have access to.

licenses.downloadAndInstal: Download and install Wapro Interconnector via Wapro ERP Installer on your computer.

clients.goToArchive: Disabling the ability to work with the application and inability to upgrade to a subscription.
clients.restoreFromArchive: Restoring from the archive enables the user and includes them in the subscription. They can be restored after 30 days from being added.
clients.restoreConfirm:
Restoring a user from the archive will allow them to work with the application and include them in the number of users for the subscription.

Do you want to restore the user from the archive?
